column4: busybox is accessed from within the initrd image. No nano because there is no proper filesystem accesible
it may have been my hallucination but I'm 99% sure nano worked on Feisty's busybox during install
Well I have only been dumped to busybox when my bootup fails to mount my HD. That's my experience
There might be a FUSE filesystem you could download for that, but I don't know
